name: VC++ Project Items File
summary: Learn about .VCXITEMS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: VCXITEMS files are not actual projects that can be compiled. They are only used to store items shared by actual VCXPROJ projects that can be compiled. You can add a reference to a VCXITEMS file by right-clicking the VCXPROJ project referencing the shared items in Visual Studio Solution Explorer and choosing Add → Reference → Shared Items.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
